task.summary: Added Sign In and Sign Up with email and password.
Added the ui account and logout
Added capability to get list catalog companies from API hh.ru
Added search companies on the hh.ru, FastAdapter and endless scrolling
Added ability to add review company.
Added reviews list in the company detail
Added ability to see review and some changes

MESSAGE.value: Added Sign In and Sign Up with email and password.

Added ability to see review and some changes
